game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a powerful artifact is hidden within an ancient ruin. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.description: You need to reach the ruins which are located in the western part of the forest.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact
task.description: Beware of traps and ancient guardians as you search for the artifact.
